data.eml:eml: Studies of Bolivian Ptiliidae (Coleoptera) 2: The subfamily Acrotrichinae including two new genera Petrotrichis and Microtrichis, and eight new species of Acrotrichis

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Darby, Michael (2015): Studies of Bolivian Ptiliidae (Coleoptera) 2: The subfamily Acrotrichinae including two new genera Petrotrichis and Microtrichis, and eight new species of Acrotrichis. Zootaxa 3999 (2): 190-210, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3999.2.2
